item.title: Going Beyond States and Markets to Civil Societies?
item.description: Shaw, Timothy M., Sandra J. MacLean. “Going Beyond States and Markets to Civil Societies?.” In Strange Power: Shaping the Parameters of International Relations and International Political Economy. Thomas Lawton, James Rosenau, Amy C. Verdun, editors. 391-406. London: Routledge, 2000. Keywords: Theory; Authority; Markets; States; Civil Society Text access (external link)
